TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataGridViewTopLeftHeaderCell extends System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell

Docs.summary: Represents the cell in the top left corner of the that sits above the row headers and to the left of the column headers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Clicking on the top left header cell selects all of the cells in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.

remarks.format:
## Remarks If you do not explicitly call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTopLeftHeaderCell.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A> method, it will be called when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.AccessibilityObject%2A> property is referenced.
> [!NOTE] > To get or set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.AccessibilityObject%2A>, you must add a reference to the `Accessibility` assembly installed with the .NET Framework.
